title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy 标签插件测试 绿 青 蓝 紫 浅 深 警告 错误 一共 12 种颜色。 Stellar Hexo GitHub Gitea 引用测试第二行测试 Stellar 是最好用的主题 /blog/index.mdfor i in range(1, 100): print(‘hello’) 12345678{ "title": "", "description": "", "screenshot": "", "url": "", "avatar": "", "version": "版本：^4.0"} More info: Deployment
